_sText:
Hey everyone the names -shadow- and I recently finished this Zombie Survival map.

**The map includes the following...**

18 Dormitory rooms
4 Outside houses
1 Barn
1 Shed
1 Cabin
Main hall
Graveyard
Island
Castle Walls/Turrets
Ocean/Beach area
Feces Pile
Rooftops
and more

**Secrets...**

Secret Room Information Guide
Tunnels
Shadow's Dungeon
Ship Graveyard
Secret teleporter of Doom
VIP Room +6 buttons for screens
over 16 hidden buttons/doors/teleporters

**If you use my map on your server please post IP here for others to check it out Thank You**

**FYI - Map is Currently only a 32 Player max...**

Map does contain anti-decompiling so I would not try this.

If you would like me to add it up to 64 players please pm me on here or you can find me with my steam ID below...

STEAM_0:0:20316352  Name should appear as -shadow-

or just email me at...

midnightlshadow@gmail.com



I spent around 175+ hours on this map.  Yes I probably could have done it faster, but this is my first ever almost 100% completed map.  

some 75 textures were created by me.

The zombie pictures I took from google and by all means i do not take any credit of the original designer of these images.

I did create a texture pack of 50 Zombie pictures. The link is below...

http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2926

Also some texture's are the creation of TopHattwaffle

My top recourse was through Tophattwaffle's website

www.tophattwaffle.com

If you are a beginner mapper then his tutorials will help you learn Hammer Editor fast and efficiently
